original_text: On their behalf I give myself to you, so that I belong completely to you. Then they also can completely belong to you, as they follow the truth.’
korean_text: 또 그들을 위하여 내가 나를 거룩하게 하오니 이는 그들도 진리로 거룩함을 얻게 하려 함이니이다

sentences.original_text: On their behalf I give myself to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위해 내가 나 자신을 당신께 드립니다

sentences.original_text: so that I belong completely to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 온전히 당신의 것이 되기 위함입니다

sentences.original_text: Then they also can completely belong to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들도 온전히 당신의 것이 될 수 있습니다
